page.title: 09RECREATION
page.content: Bishopton Library was opened in 1984 to replace the smaller library within Bishopton Primary School. Use of a BBC microcomputer is available free along with the usual facilities of book and record lending. The Community Centre was opened in 1974. It is used by a wide variety of sports and leisure groups. Bishopton has a Tennis Club and a Bowling Club. The Church Centre and the Youth Centre are both used by Bishopton's uniformed youth organisations. A hotel and a public house provide another source of recreation.
